text: Majeerteen is a tribe in northeast Somalia.Helander, Bernhard. "Rahanweyn sociability: a model for other Somalis?." African Languages and Cultures. Supplement (1996): 195-204. Majeerteen borders Warsangeli and reer darawiish to the west. On its south are Lailkase and the Habar Gidir. Carruth, Lauren. "Kinship, nomadism, and humanitarian aid among Somalis in Ethiopia." Disasters 42.1 (2018): 149-168. ==References== Category:Ethnic groups in Somalia
title: Majeerteen
